results.definition: give or assign a resource to a particular person or cause
examples: I will earmark this money for your research
She sets aside time for meditation every day

results.definition: take possession of by force, as after an invasion
examples: the invaders seized the land and property of the inhabitants

results.definition: suitable for a particular person or place or condition etc
examples: a book not appropriate for children
a funeral conducted the appropriate solemnity
it seems that an apology is appropriate
